 $gp

Detailed Description

This is the application controller.

This is the controller which initializes the internal variables and calls the SAPageHandler::handle method which will instantiate the page class, run its events and display it

Definition at line 25 of file SApplication.php.

Member Function Documentation

default constructor initializes the page search dir, page name and GET & POST variables must be called explicitely by the inheriting classes
